info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 11:48PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Joseph, northern La Porte and southwestern Berrien Counties through 1230 AM EDT/1130 PM CDT/... At 1148 PM EDT/1048 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Michigan City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Michigan City, La Porte, Buchanan, Trail Creek, New Buffalo, New Carlisle, Three Oaks, Long Beach, Pottawattamie Park, Shorewood-Tower Hill, Shorewood-Tower Hills-Harbert, Dayton, Baroda, Galien, Michiana Shores, Grand Beach, Michiana, Union Pier, Glendora and Waterford. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 41 and 70. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 45. Interstate 94 in Michigan between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
